mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacation (vacation_id, m_id, e_name, start_date, end_date, reason, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{vacationId}, #{mId}, #{eName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reason}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE vacation SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, reason = #{reason}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE vacation_id = #{vacationId};
mapper.select: SELECT vacation_id AS vacationId, m_id AS mId, e_name AS eName, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, reason FROM vacation WHERE vacation_id = #{vacationId};
